video_info.title: The Emirates FA Cup 2025-26
video_info.shortDescription: Tottenham host Aston Villa in a Round 3 FA Cup clash that promises intensity. Spurs look to steady their form, while Villa aim to carry their strong run into knockout action. Who will come out on top? Find out as we bring you all the action from The Emirates FA Cup 2025-26, LIVE on Sony LIV.
video_info.longDescription: Tottenham host Aston Villa in a Round 3 FA Cup clash that promises intensity. Spurs look to steady their form, while Villa aim to carry their strong run into knockout action. Who will come out on top? Find out as we bring you all the action from The Emirates FA Cup 2025-26, LIVE on Sony LIV.
video_info.episodeTitle: Tottenham vs Aston Villa - Round 3 - 10 Jan 2026

video_info.title: The Emirates FA Cup 2025-26
video_info.shortDescription: Newcastle United face Bournemouth at St James’ Park, with both teams eager to make a strong statement. Expect a fast-paced football contest as pace, tactics, and teamwork come to the fore, and every pass, tackle, and chance in the final third plays a key role in deciding the outcome. Find out who comes out on top as we bring you all the live action from this encounter. Catch all action from the Emirates FA Cup 2025-26, streaming exclusively only on Sony LIV.

video_info.title: Bundesliga 2025-26
video_info.shortDescription: Bayer Leverkusen host VfB Stuttgart in Bundesliga matchday 16 at BayArena. Leverkusen ride a three-game unbeaten streak, boasting strong home form and a dominant record. Stuttgart enter unbeaten in four games. Tune in to find out who continues their winning streak. Catch all the action from Bundesliga 2025-26, LIVE on Sony LIV.
